name: [Deprecated] Make Backup: NineAnimator
tagline: Do NO USE THIS PACKAGE, it is deprecated and will be updated once the build 6 comes out to use the new installation method. In the meantime use the nightly version. If you already have this package installed, make a backup in the app to transfer the data to the new version once it comes out.

maintainer.name: Marcus, Uttiya, and others behind the scenes

name: NineAnimator Nightly
tagline: Nightly build of NineAnimator. May be unstable. Package uses wget, python 3, unzip, zip, link identity editor, appsync, and appinst to update and install the app. To update the app simply reinstall this package. No data should be lost, but... Also, due to resigning the ipa with ldid, downloads, notifications, and icon switching may be broken.

maintainer.name: Marcus, Uttiya, and others behind the scenes

pre_dependencies: wget, python3, ldid, net.angelxwind.appsyncunified, com.linusyang.appinst, unzip, zip

changelog.Changes: Overhauled installation method. Make backup before updating, but hey it's the nightly version, so if data loss occurs, it's not my problem.
